data_table.description: The subject sample mapping file contains a mapping of subject IDs to sample IDs. Samples are the final preps submitted for sequencing. For example, if one patient (subject ID) gave one sample, and that sample was processed differently to generate 2 sequencing runs, there would be two rows, both using the same subject ID, but having 2 unique sample IDs. This table also contains multiple sample aliases and sample use.

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository [RUTGERS_SITE]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID2
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository [RUTGERS_CELLLINE]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID3
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository [BOS_AC]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID4
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository [AGRE]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID5
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository [NIMH]

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID6
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository [NDAR]

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Seq_DNA_SNP: SNP genotypes derived from sequence data; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing
